help.clusterName: You will use the cluster's name to identify which of your SoftLayer devices are part of this cluster.
help.locationId: You should select the location closest to your data source to achieve better data transfer rates
help.edition: You must purchase a BigInsights license before creating your cluster or use your own if you already have a valid license.
help.serverType: Dedicated BareMetal are single tenant physical servers while Virtual Servers are virtual machines on a multi-tenant environment. The deployment time for Dedicated BareMetal is significant higher compared to Virtual Servers.
help.maxInternalDrivers: This option defines the chassis size for your server. A larger chassis allows you to have more space for RAM and disks.
help.masterRam: The master node on a BigInsights cluster uses a significant amout of RAM. For a small cluster you can use 32GB but we recommend at least 96 GB for anything bigger.
help.dataRam: The data nodes on a BigInsights cluster don't rely as much on RAM storage
help.network: Currently we only support 1 Gbps network speed.
help.numberOfServers: You should have at least 3 data node servers for optimal performance.
help.maxInternalDrives: This option defines the chassis size for your server. A larger chassis allows you to have more space for RAM and disks.
help.operatingSystemDisk: Enabling RAID 1 provides a secondary hard drive for operating system data redundancy, this will improve system availability.
help.numberOfDataDisks: Having more disks per server allows you to store more data into your BigInsights cluster.
help.masterRaid: Enabling RAID 1 provides a secondary hard drive for operating system data redundacy, this will improve system availability.

blu.title: BLU 加速云
blu.tryHeader: 直接在Web浏览器中尝试BLU加速云（测试版）
blu.try: 尝试BLU加速云使用下面的Cloudify部件。评估一组的直接大数据仓库和分析技术，从您的浏览器不花钱。只要遵循这些简单的步骤:
blu.step1: 步骤1：点击播放按钮下面的窗口小部件。如果您没有看到一个小部件，确保已启用JavaScript，并且您使用的是现代的Web浏览器。
blu.step2: 步骤2：立即报名参加试用，通过您的谷歌的ID或通过在出现的弹出提供您的姓名和电子邮件。
blu.step3: 步骤3：当你的系统准备就绪后，小部件将显示一个开始BLU加速度链接。点击这个链接，开始试用。您可以放心地忽略任何证书警告。在打开的页面中，输入用户名的，并密码在下面的窗口小部件的底部右侧所示。
blu.noteDetails: 建议您不要您的免费BLU加速云的审讯期间上传敏感数据。
blu.trialEnds: 当你的试用期结束后，继续使用BLU加速云使用的独奏或业务计划。
